extendedInfo.description: "Drag & Draw - Cutie" is a drawing style game, it is easy to play even if you don't know how to draw. The goal of this game is to reveal an underlying image by dragging your finger along navigator points (blue & pink spots).Try not to miss the navigator points to get high accuracy and unlock next images.Images of this app is in Manga Style, 30 images of pretty girl to play and more in next version. If you like Manga or Anime, try it out!In order to keep the app completely free, this app use push notifications and icons ads. You can opt-out anytime you want.v1.04- added new 6 images- fixed bugv1.05- decrease loading time

reviews.comment: The Best :D (To trace:just follow where the pink lines go )............\tThis is the best I learned anime here and everyone says it\'s hard but it\'s easy they just don\'t get how it works  P.S. : PLZ PUT MORE UPDATES I REALLY LOVE THIS IS HAVE FINISHED ALL THE LEVELS PLZ UPDATE I WILL KEEP WAITING FOR AN UPDATE :D heres a tip: zoom in the drawing and try to draw it in zoom in and also you can press the pencil at the upper right corner and the pencil will change into a hand and you can move the image (when zoomed in) also press the hand again and it will change to a pencil

reviews.title: Amazing- But Easy
reviews.comment: Amazing app. Really fun! But i think you should add more animal people, and add some guys and animals. That\'ll up the difficulty and it\'ll be more fun because they\'re different. Other than that great job.
reviews.author: Athena Maide

reviews.title: Level
reviews.comment: It is incredibly fun.  I enjoy playing it, but it gets boring when you run out of new levels.  Also, why are there no guys?  And why are there only two animal people?  Why does the last level have only 18 possible stars?  If this is updated with guys and animal people, I will hug someone.
